meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jesse Darland Shari Post Matt Lisiecki Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7711.

td.p: Jesse Darland, an editor from Charleston, South Carolina
Shari Post, a software engineer from Aurora, Colorado
Matt Lisiecki, an international development researcher from Brooklyn, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $14,950)

tr.td: SCIENCE
HOME FURNISHINGS
ODDS & ENDS
DITLOIDS
A MAN FOR 2 SEASONS
THOMAS LESS
